abstract: As speculation swirls that Citigroup may make Vikram S. Pandit its new chief executive, the financial giant is adding yet more former Morgan Stanley executives to its roster.
lead_paragraph: As speculation swirls that Citigroup may make Vikram S. Pandit its new chief executive, the financial giant is adding yet more former Morgan Stanley executives to its roster.

headline.main: Citi to Buy Buyout Firm Metalmark
